title: Is the Minna no Nihongo a good book to buy for starting Japanese? - Quora

response.answer_text: A generation of foreigners in Japan came up on that series. It was the go to book for many or most Japanese classes before the Genki book came along. If you stick with it it will work well for you. The complete lack of English makes things a bit tougher in the beginning, but helps your progress.
